name: seed-map-with-history
description: Add history to random seeds created within Seed Map.

scripts.copy: npm run copy:manifest & npm run copy:imgs
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:js & npm run build:css & npm run copy
scripts.build:min: npm run clean && npm run build:js:min & npm run build:css:min & npm run copy

author: Kitsune Gadget / Yu
